europeana:record.dc:title: Systematic notes on Asian birds. 23. Types of the Campephagidae
Zoologische Verhandelingen

europeana:record.dc:subject: Aves
Campephagidae
cuckoo-shrikes
cicadabirds

minivets
types
lectotype designations
europeana:record.dc:description: A list of nearly 300 names applied to Asian forms of species of cuckoo-shrikes and minivets and their allies (family Campephagidae) is provided. This list provides information on the whereabouts of a type; where our information does not include reliable data we provide notes to explain the deficit and to stimulate others to offer additional data or sources of information. Lectotypes are designated for the following: Phoenicornis affinis McClelland, 1840; Muscicapa flammea Forster, 1781; Phoenicornis elegans Horsfield, 1840.
europeana:record.dcterms:alternative: With colour plate on p. 215 ; Corrigenda published in ZV 344 (2003), p. 117 and in: Zoologische Mededelingen 80-5 (2006), p. 315
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Systematic notes on Asian birds. 23. Types of the Campephagidae (Volume 440)
